itunes:title: Episode 829 - Special Guest Tim Grover, the Man Behind MJ and Kobe
title: Episode 829 - Special Guest Tim Grover, the Man Behind MJ and Kobe
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson is joined by Tim Grover, the personal trainer to NBA legends like Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant, to talk about what it really takes to be a winner, what really caused Jordan’s flu game, the difference between Kobe and Jordan in how they t...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson is joined by Tim Grover, the personal trainer to NBA legends like Michael Jordan and Kobe Bryant, to talk about what it really takes to be a winner, what really caused Jordan’s flu game, the difference between Kobe and Jordan in how they trained, and how he felt after Kobe’s death.
